name: looptools
description:
LoopTools is a package for evaluation of scalar and tensor one-loop
integrals based on the FF package by G.J. van Oldenborgh. It features an
easy Fortran, C++, and Mathematica interface to the scalar one-loop
functions of FF and in addition provides the 2-, 3-, and 4-point tensor
coefficient functions.

dependent_to.name: vbfnlo
dependent_to.description:
VBFNLO is a fully flexible parton level Monte Carlo program for the
simulation of vector boson fusion, double and triple vector boson
production in hadronic collisions at next to leading order in the strong
coupling constant.
